nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 92. Heat index values as high as 105. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 76. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
